trans-unit.source: Describes the different notification types that can be received by an <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.OnChangeEventHandler"></xref> event handler through the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationEventArgs"></xref> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 描述可接收的不同通知類型<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.OnChangeEventHandler"></xref>透過事件處理常式<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationEventArgs"></xref>參數。

trans-unit.source: The SqlNotificationType enumeration is referenced by an instance of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationEventArgs>類別</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationEventArgs>的執行個體所參考的 SqlNotificationType 列舉

trans-unit.source: This information is provided when a notification event is fired with the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>類別</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>與通知事件引發時提供這項資訊

trans-unit.source: Data on the server being monitored changed.
trans-unit.target: 正在監視的伺服器上的資料變更。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo"></xref> item to determine the details of the change.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo"></xref>項目，以判斷變更的詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: There was a failure to create a notification subscription.
trans-unit.target: 發生錯誤，以建立通知訂閱。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationEventArgs"></xref> object's <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo"></xref> item to determine the cause of the failure.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationEventArgs"></xref>物件的<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationInfo"></xref>項目，以判斷失敗的原因。

trans-unit.source: Used when the type option sent by the server was not recognized by the client.
trans-unit.target: 當用戶端無法辨識伺服器所傳送的型別選項使用。
